welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Ubach-Palenberg, known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for budget airlines and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
